content: Hubie Chen | King's College London Skip to main contentDr Hubie Chen Senior LecturerResearch interestsComputer scienceContact detailshubie.chen@kcl.ac.ukBiographyHubie Chen is a Senior Lecturer in the Department of Informatics at King’s College London. Prior to working in the UK, he was an Ikerbasque Research Professor in Donostia-San Sebastian, Spain. He has held invited positions at institutions such as E ́cole Polytechnique, Humboldt-Universit ̈at zu Berlin, and Universit ̈at Wien. He received his PhD and BS degrees in computer science and mathematics from Cornell University and Stanford University, respectively.
